unnormalised: Hey everyone! So, I've been diving deep into adaptive learning recently, and I'm kinda blown away. Forget rote learning for that IIT-JEE exam! This stuff personalizes learning like your mom makes chai – exactly to your taste.

unnormalised: Basically, adaptive learning platforms use AI to figure out what you, as an individual student (think Rohan from Delhi), actually *know* and what you’re struggling with. It then tweaks the content and the difficulty level to match *your* needs. No more sitting through boring lectures on stuff you already aced, or getting lost when the teacher speeds through something you didn't understand in class on 20/02/2024.
